title: HELP PLS
body: I wanted to create a PBE account i did everything what i needed to do but i didn't recive an e-mail. I wait 1-2 weeks but nothing. I have lvl 30 and i am on right gmail account,

replies.body: I saw that your application was received, but we aren't able to force an application to be accepted.  I don't have any tips on getting in beyond the[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  I can only wish you best of luck with your application!
Same man just keep waiting i guess
